pageContent: Objectives: To evaluate the oncological and functional outcomes of salvage high-intensity focused ultrasound (S-HIFU) for locally recurrent prostate cancer after low-dose-rate (LDR) brachytherapy.

metaData.source:
[Transrectal high-intensity focused ultrasound with the Sonablate 500 for the treatment of prostate cancer]
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/18077913/
